Sentencas: LiNi-oxide showed triple (oxygen ionic, protonic and electronic) conduction properties and were considered as the promising cathode for proton conducting solid oxide fuel cells (H -SOFC).
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this work, we pioneeringly explore the potential of LixNiO2 (x = 0.2, 0.4, 0.5, 0.8) (LxNO) for symmetrical electrode and electrolyte application.
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The composite of semiconductor LxNO and proton conductor BaZr0.5Y0.5O3(BZY)are applied as electrolyte with L0.5NO as symmetrical electrode to assemble solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: There is no negative impact on cell performance after introducing the electronic conductor LxNO into BZY as electrolyte membrane.
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: On the contrary, the cell based on L0.5NO -BZY composite electrolyte is significantly higher than that of pure BZY electrolyte.
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The cell performance can be improved by optimizing the weight ratio of BZY and L0.5NO.
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When the mass ratio of BZY to L0.5NO was 8:2, the open circuit voltage (OCV) of the cell was 1.11 V, and the maximum power (Pmax) was 814 mW,cm-2 at 550 degrees
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell
LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This work demonstrated that the LiNi-oxide can be simultaneously used as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell.(c) 2022 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: LiNi-oxide simultaneously as electrolyte and symmetrical electrode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell
